definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: The euro and the Yugoslav dinar are both accepted currencies in Kosovo.
sentences.chinese: 歐元以及南斯拉夫第納爾共爲科索沃的官方貨幣。

sentences.english: Added a "gain 1000 denars" in camp cheat menu.
sentences.chinese: 增加了一個“獲得1000第納爾”的陣營作弊菜單。

sentences.english: The gold dinar to be exact.
The currency used in game is known as the Denar .
sentences.chinese: 遊戲中通用的貨幣叫做第納爾。
